'''Mythcon 32''' was the thirty-second annual [[Mythopoeic Society]] conference.

*'''Theme:''' "Many Dimensions: Modern Supernatural Fiction"
*'''Guests of Honor:''' David Llewellyn Dodds (Williams scholar) and [[Peter S. Beagle]] (fantasy author)
*'''Chairman:''' Eric Rauscher
